sqlMap.insert:
SELECT MALL.MALL_SEQ_COUPON.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO MALL.MALL_TB_COUPON ( COUPON_ID, COUPON_NAME, SHOP_ID, VALUE, LEVEL_ID, QUOTA, AT_LEAST, TOTAL, START_DATE, END_DATE, EXPIRE_NOTICE, REMARK, STATE, MODIFY_USER ) VALUES ( #couponId#, #couponName#, #shopId#, #value#, #levelId#, #quota#, #atLeast#, #total#, #startDate#, #endDate#, #expireNotice#, #remark#, #state#, #modifyUser# )
